questions.question: It's the third week of school in this virtual environment. Which are you feeling the *most*?

choices.answer: Excited!  I generally enjoy school and/or learning.
Relieved.  I'm happy to have something to do; I'm tired of being bored!
So-so.  I have concerns about learning online, and/or I miss my friends.
Not great.  I don't like learning online OR I don't like school in general.

questions.question: True or false: I know how to get all my assignments and have what I need to compelte them.

choices.answer: I am not sure how to access many of my assignments.

questions.question: How are you feeling about your classes overall?

choices.answer: I am doing great in my classes!
Its more difficult learning on line.
Some are ok, others are challenging.
I am doing ok and feel pretty confident.

questions.question: In my opinion, the *worst* part of online learning is...

choices.answer: Sitting in front of a screen all day makes my eyes/legs/nalgas hurt.
I don't get to spend time with my friends.
My family can see and hear everything.

questions.question: In my opinion, the *best* part of online learning is...

choices.answer: I can wear sweatpants and slippers every day.
I get to spend more time with my family.
